about.hero_subtitle: For over 15 years, your trusted partner for premium vehicles in Grenchen and beyond.
about.story_p1: Auto V√∂geli was founded in 2008 with the vision of making vehicle purchases transparent and trustworthy. What began as a small family business has grown into one of the leading dealerships in the region.
about.story_p2: Our success is built on three pillars: quality, trust, and personal service. Every vehicle undergoes a rigorous quality inspection, and our customers benefit from honest, expert advice.
about.quality_text: All our vehicles are inspected by certified technicians and come with comprehensive warranty.
about.values_subtitle: These principles guide everything we do
about.value_trust_text: Honest advice with no hidden costs. We deliver what we promise.
about.value_service_text: Individual consultation and personal support from the first inquiry to after the purchase.
about.value_quality_text: Only carefully selected and inspected vehicles make it into our range.
about.cta_subtitle: Visit our showroom or book a personal consultation.

finanzierung.title: Financing
finanzierung.subtitle: made easy
finanzierung.description: Realize your dream of a new vehicle with our flexible and affordable financing solutions.
finanzierung.calculator_description: Calculate your monthly payment quickly and easily. Adjust the parameters to your needs.
finanzierung.why_description: Benefit from our fair conditions and personal service
finanzierung.quick_approval_desc: Financing approval within 24 hours. Simple and without long waiting times.
finanzierung.low_rates_desc: Benefit from attractive interest rates from 3.9% effective. Fair conditions without hidden costs.
finanzierung.flexible_rates_desc: Choose your desired term between 12 and 84 months. Adapted to your budget.
finanzierung.how_it_works_desc: In just 3 steps to your financing
finanzierung.step1_desc: Find your dream vehicle in our range or let us advise you.
finanzierung.step2_desc: Fill out our simple application. We check your information discreetly and quickly.
finanzierung.step3_desc: After approval, you can take over your new vehicle immediately and drive away.
finanzierung.cta_description: Contact us for a non-binding consultation. We find the optimal financing solution for you.

kontakt.title: Contact
kontakt.subtitle: & Consultation
kontakt.description: We are here for you! Contact us for personal advice or visit us directly in our showroom.
kontakt.write_description: Do you have questions about a vehicle or would you like to arrange a consultation appointment? Simply fill out the contact form, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
kontakt.test_drive_desc: Simply enter "Test drive" in the subject and the desired vehicle. We will be happy to arrange an appointment with you.
kontakt.form_placeholder: Tell us how we can help you...
kontakt.success_message: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.
